data_table.description: Brain MRI Measurements Method 2, Original, Offspring, Generation Cohorts, and New Offspring Spouse Cohorts. Brain MRI performed between 2009 - 2012 to establish baseline measures of brain morphology and cognitive function. Two methods have been used to read brain MRIs at Framingham to date. Method 1 is an older method and is no longer being used. Method 2 is a new method. Method 2 did not start until 2009. There are some MRI scans that have been read using both methods. Note that when this is true, the measurements may differ. This dataset contains scans read using Method 2.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant ID number.

variable.name: TCV
variable.description: Total cranial volume

variable.name: LLV
variable.description: Traced left lateral ventricle volume

variable.name: IIC
variable.description: Segmented third ventricle volume

variable.name: LLC
variable.description: Segmented left lateral ventricle volume

variable.name: III
variable.description: Traced third ventricle volume

variable.name: WMHI
variable.description: Segmented white matter hyperintensities volume

variable.name: TLV
variable.description: Total lateral ventricle volume

variable.name: R_Hippo
variable.description: Right hippocampus volume

variable.name: L_Hippo
variable.description: Left hippocampus volume

variable.name: RLV
variable.description: Traced right lateral ventricle volume

variable.name: TCB
variable.description: Total hemispheric brain volume

variable.name: RLC
variable.description: Segmented right lateral ventricle volume

variable.name: TCC
variable.description: Total hemispheric cerebrospinal fluid
